title.en: The Heart of the Deep Vortex

description.ko: 압도적인 심해의 깊이 속에서, 순수한 빛의 진주가 생물 발광의 불꽃 춤을 깨웁니다.
description.en: In the crushing depths, a pearl of pure light awakens a dance of bioluminescent fire.

prompt: A massive, spiraling underwater vortex of bioluminescent plankton and rising bubbles surrounding a central 'pearl' of concentrated turquoise energy. Detailed fluid simulation with intricate caustic patterns dancing across the deep-sea trench walls. Focus on deep-sea translucency and the fluid dynamics of the swirling water. 8k, Octane Render. Raytraced caustics and volumetric underwater lighting create a sense of immense depth. Subsurface scattering on the plankton clouds, with global illumination from the energy core lighting the dark water.
